ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuControllers

Class DataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuControllers.DataController

  • public class DataController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller for all data manipulation, and all data that is passed to the data manager. That is questions, cached, favorited, and unpushed content.
    Author:
    Ahmed

      This gets the question by id based on the id passed and the file type you want to receive it from
      void pushOfflineContent()
      when called, pushes all of the offline data that is in the unpushed file type online and then clears the unpushed save file

      • getQuestionById

        public Question getQuestionById(int id,
                                java.lang.String choice)
        This gets the question by id based on the id passed and the file type you want to receive it from
        Parameters:
        id - is the ID of the question
        choice - is the file type you want to retrieve the question from
        Returns:
        the question based off the id

      • clearData

        public void clearData(java.lang.String choice)
        This clears all of the data of the file of a specific data type
        Parameters:
        choice - is the file type you would like to clear (favorites, cached, etc.)

      • saveData

        public void saveData(java.util.ArrayList<Question> dataToSave,
                     java.lang.String choice)
        This uses the data manager and the data and file type and then saves that data to the file using the data manager
        Parameters:
        dataToSave - is the Arraylist of Questions that is willing to be saved
        choice - is the file type of data

      • getData

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> getData(java.lang.String choice)
        Returns the Array list from the data manager of the Questions from a specific file type
        Parameters:
        choice - is the file data type you would like data from
        Returns:

      • addData

        public void addData(Question q,
                    java.lang.String choice)
        adding data (a question) to a specific file type based on a choice
        Parameters:
        q - is a question that is passed
        choice - is the file type that you are adding data to

      • pushOfflineContent

        public void pushOfflineContent()
        when called, pushes all of the offline data that is in the unpushed file type online and then clears the unpushed save file
